title: Support Member Methods in VariableContext
description: The Javascript compiler now supports simple member methods being processed by expression Bindings.  The VariableContext should also support being able to parse member methods.

comments.author: Jack Conradson
comments.content: Attached a patch that includes both the change and new tests.

comments.author: Jack Conradson
comments.content: Second patch that only parses methods for members instead of for the equivalent of method pointers.
